name: api_rendering_TrailRenderer
description: Creates a visual trail of polygons that follows a GameObject's movement, useful for emphasizing motion or creating dynamic visual effects.

properties.name: alignment
properties.description: Select whether the trail will face the camera, or the orientation of the Transform Component.

properties.name: applyActiveColorSpace
properties.description: Set whether colors will be converted appropriately before being passed to the GPU when using Linear Rendering.

properties.name: autodestruct
properties.description: Does the GameObject of this Trail Renderer auto destruct?

properties.name: colorGradient
properties.description: Set the color gradient describing the color of the trail at various points along its length.

properties.name: emitting
properties.description: Creates trails when the GameObject moves.

properties.name: endColor
properties.description: Set the color at the end of the trail.

properties.name: endWidth
properties.description: The width of the trail at the end of the trail.

properties.name: generateLightingData
properties.description: Configures a trail to generate Normals and Tangents. With this data, Scene lighting can affect the trail via Normal Maps and the Unity Standard Shader, or your own custom-built Shaders.

properties.name: maskInteraction
properties.description: Specifies how the TrailRenderer interacts with SpriteMask.

properties.name: minVertexDistance
properties.description: Set the minimum distance the trail can travel before a new vertex is added to it.

properties.name: numCapVertices
properties.description: Set this to a value greater than 0, to get rounded corners on each end of the trail.

properties.name: numCornerVertices
properties.description: Set this to a value greater than 0, to get rounded corners between each segment of the trail.

properties.name: positionCount
properties.description: Get the number of line segments in the trail.

properties.name: shadowBias
properties.description: Apply a shadow bias to prevent self-shadowing artifacts. The specified value is the proportion of the trail width at each segment.

properties.name: startColor
properties.description: Set the color at the start of the trail.

properties.name: startWidth
properties.description: The width of the trail at the spawning point.

properties.name: textureMode
properties.description: Choose whether the U coordinate of the trail texture is tiled or stretched.

properties.name: textureScale
properties.description: A multiplier for the UV coordinates of the trail texture.

properties.name: time
properties.description: How long does the trail take to fade out.

properties.name: widthCurve
properties.description: Set the curve describing the width of the trail at various points along its length.
